section.title: Maven JAXB Plugin
section.para: If you are using Maven, JAXB jars are available in the java.net maven repository. This repository is synced with maven central, so usually you find all JAXB releases in maven central after ~ 1 day after java.net release.

section.title: XJC Plugins
section.para: Various people in the community have developed plugins for XJC that you can use today. These plugins allow you to enhance/alter the code generation of XJC in many different ways.
